A split-mouth experimental design use , success rate instal implant determine . Twelve select patient ( correspond minimum 24 surgical implant site ) receive endosseous Ti dental implant . DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Peri Implant Bone Loss Immediately Versus Conventionally Loaded Implants With Single Prosthesis
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective prospective , control , randomize clinical study evaluate peri-implant bone loss immediately load versus conventionally load implant single prosthesis . A split-mouth experimental design use , success rate instal implant determine . Twelve select patient ( correspond minimum 24 surgical implant site ) receive endosseous Ti dental implant . The protocol prepare surgical site base manufacturer 's recommendation bone density . Patients initial torque le 30 N·cm implant stability quotient ( ISQ ) less 60 exclude research . Envelopes , indicate site test site , open implant instal . Transfer impression implant receive immediate loading produce temporary crown make . Temporary crown instal maximum 24 hour surgery , use torque recommend manufacturer . Appropriate occlusal adjustment make ensure minimal contact maximum intercuspation absence contact protrusive lateral excursive movement jaw . At baseline ( time implant installation ) 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 month implant installation , follow aspect evaluate : initial torque moment implant insertion , Osstell ISQ , pain implant subject vertical horizontal force , clinical mobility implant , crestal bone loss around implant ( determined x-ray evaluation ) , probe depth around implant , periodontal pain . These data collect control/delayed load group test/immediate load group , follow statistical analysis
